quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. – Steve Jobs
fact: A snail can sleep for three years.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What's red and bad for your teeth? A Brick.
